pages.name: Name
pages.title: Title
pages.subject: Subject
pages.profile_information_text: Update your account's profile information and email address.
pages.update_password_text: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
pages.delete_account_text: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
pages.sure_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
pages.leave_blank_tag_global: Leave blank to make this tag global
pages.forgot_password_text_1: No problem. Just let us know your email
pages.forgot_password_text_2: address and we will email you a password reset link that will
pages.forgot_password_text_3: allow you to choose a new one
pages.login_to_account_text: Enter your email below to login to your account
pages.create_your_account_text: Enter your information below to sign up
pages.password_reset_success: Your password has been reset successfully
pages.first_login_success: Your password has been created successfully
pages.register_privacy_policy: By registering an account you fully accept our

privacy_policy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy_page.description: Welcome to our Privacy Policy page. Your privacy is critically important to us. It is our policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. This Privacy Policy applies to all the services we offer.

pages.plan_name_helper: This field must be the same as the other plan with a different frequency, to get grouped in the same card

variables_conditions.title: Variables & Conditions
variables_conditions.campaign_content: This will be replaced with the content of the campaign email.
variables_conditions.subscriber_full_name: Subscriber's full name (if available) will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_first_name: Subscriber's first name will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_last_name: Subscriber's last name will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_email: Subscriber's email will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_phone: Subscriber's phone will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_email_status: Subscribers's email status will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_company: Subscriber's company will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_industry: Subscriber's industry will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_location: Subscriber's location will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_profile_picture: Subscriber's profile picture will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_linkedin_url: Subscriber's linkedin url will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.subscriber_note: Subscriber's note will be replaced with this variable.
variables_conditions.unsubscribe_link: This will be used for unsubscribe link sent to subscribers
variables_conditions.if_variable: This will be used to conditionally render the content if the variable has value. Please replace 'variable' with the actual variable name. Make sure for each if there is a corresponding endif.
variables_conditions.if_else_variable: This will be used to conditionally render the content if the variable has value else render other content. Please replace 'variable' with the actual variable name. Make sure for each if there is a corresponding endif.

validation.try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
